attributes.additional_details:
It is about time Her Majesty's Government stood up for Human Rights and justice in Syria. The no fly zone over Libya following UN Resolution 1974 led to a new democratic regime and freed the world of one of its worst human rights abusers.

The Coailiton Government should now begin stepping up international pressure for a new NATO - UN no fly zone over Syria so that more people may enjoy the universal human right to self determination!

Please Sign and protect global human rights, fight for the free people of Syria.
